message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I think the product is worth more than $120. How about we meet at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $130. How about we try $125?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $125, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $125. How about we try $127.50?
I'm close to accepting, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $127.50. How about we try $126?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $126, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $127.50 and $126. How about we try $126.75?
I'm getting close, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $126.75. How about we try $125.50?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $125.50, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $126.75 and $125.50. How about we try $126.125?
I'm not going to go any higher, Alice. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. How about we try $125.75?
